snippet: The end of the era of Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg has been greeted with consternation in any number of New York’s professional subcultures.
abstract: Trailside blog; boldface names in New York’s booming movie and television industry are reaching out to Mayor Michael R Bloomberg’s possible successors, hoping to secure promise that a film-friendly environment can continue regardless of who occupies City Hall.
lead_paragraph: The end of the era of Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg has been greeted with consternation in any number of New York’s professional subcultures.

headline.main: Seeking a Mayor Friendly to Films
headline.print_headline:
Seeking a Mayor
Friendly to Films
